title: HR Sphere dashboard
about: A user-friendly HR management platform with secure authentication and real-time data handling via Firebase.

title: FinGenius landing page
about: A sleek and animated landing page crafted with Framer Motion for a dynamic user experience.

alt: A visually captivating landing page featuring smooth animations powered by GSAP.
title: Binge
about: A movie-viewing platform in development, featuring a dynamic landing page with GSAP animations. The registration, login, and payment screens are completed, and the home screen for signed-in users is currently being built.

title: IP address tracker
about: A versatile tool for tracking IP addresses. This application displays essential details like the user's IP address, ISP, and timezone, while utilizing React Leaflet to render a map showcasing the ISP location. The integration of APIs ensures real-time data accuracy.

title: ToDo app
about: A practical and secure task management application with built-in user authentication powered by Firebase. Registered users can log in to manage and access their personal to-do lists, ensuring a personalized and private experience.

title: Trendy Trove
about: An engaging and minimalist landing page enriched with simple yet effective animations. The design focuses on clarity and style, making it a great example of impactful yet lightweight web development.

title: Github profile searcher
about: Search and explore GitHub profiles with user details displayed in an interactive UI.

title: Language translator
about: A multilingual translator application offering features like text translation, copy functionality, and audio playback. Its simple interface ensures accessibility for a wide audience, while APIs provide reliable translations.

title: Dictionary
about: An intuitive dictionary app that combines functionality and style. It features audio playback for pronunciation and theme switching for enhanced accessibility, all within a clean and modern design.
